TXMD Tripled down on TXMD and continue to add to dips With over 85M shares short before yesterdays lowering of near term estimates nothing unexpected here Long term we have a strong ramp to first product IMVEXXY with a 7 market share BIJUVA had 1100 prescribers in first 2 months most also Rx IMVEXXY so launch is similar BIJUVA though is a potential blockbuster as ONLY FDA approved BioIdentical drug for symptoms of menopause Annovera will soft launch Q3 and ramp up in Q4 Right now facing headwinds of coverage Mgmt mad a decision that rather then spend on Direct to ConsumerDTC Ads decided on copay assistance to remove obstacle and gain a firm base of prescribers and happy patients This strategy has worked for others in the past and expect it to again Annibelle Samimy of Steifel who asked many questions yesterday at ID came out with 20 PT today I am a long term bull for TXMD on its own growth and as a takeover candidate with 3 approved female products
